effects: Section 27 of Act 776 (2025) appropriates federal funds to the Administrative Office of the Courts for drug court enhancement.  It allocates more than $9 million for FY 2026, covering operating expenses, travel and training, professional fees, grants and aid, and an adult treatment court program【556692708300381†L661-L679】.  This appropriation ensures the AOC has resources to support adult and juvenile specialty courts through the Drug Court Enhancement program.
